alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hamilton; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Webster, northern Boone and Hamilton Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 934 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Webster City to 6 miles southeast of Gowrie. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Webster City around 940 PM CDT. Jewell Junction around 950 PM CDT. Ogden around 955 PM CDT. Boone around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Boxholm, Duncombe, Woodman Hollow State Park, Stratford, Dolliver Memorial State Park, Kamrar, Lehigh, Fraser, Dayton and Ellsworth. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 129 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
